ratings.comment: Professor Li is one of the best professor I have had at UW. I've taken two of her classes, even though I don't specialize in Chinese art history. She is so knowledgable and every lecture is a treat!

Professor Li's lectures are very intriguing and educational. At every lecture, you'll learn something new. Her lectures can get a bit boring but she is values all the students' opinions and thoughts. She really cares about your grade and your work so make sure to participate and ask her questions.

Yuhang Li is a fantastic professor.  Lots of reading and memorization for the tests but it's art hist.  Her lectures are interesting, she is super encouraging of participation and comments and really enthusiastic about her subject.  I would def take the class again.
A ton of reading material. Classes were mostly discussion based. Pretty standard, and easy-ish for 400 level. Li's winning personality made up for any deficiencies in lecture.
